Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the number of members in the public service commission
Summary: Increases the number of members in the public service commission from five to seven members.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to membership in the public service commission
